name: airdrop
description: This project demonstrates a basic Hardhat use case. It comes with a sample contract, a test for that contract, and a script that deploys that contract.

scripts.start:arbitrum: npx hardhat --network arbitrum bridge_to_zksync_era && npx hardhat --network zksyncEraMainnet mainnet
scripts.start:ethereum: npx hardhat --network ethereum bridge_to_zksync_era && npx hardhat --network zksyncEraMainnet mainnet
scripts.start:optimism: npx hardhat --network optimism bridge_to_zksync_era && npx hardhat --network zksyncEraMainnet mainnet
